name: wdio-ava
description: Experiment with running wdio v5 with AVA
author: Oleksii Ihnatiuk

scripts.pretest: npm run build && npm run chromedriver:up
scripts.posttest: npm run clean && npm run chromedriver:down
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run tsc
scripts.aftertest: npm run selenoid:cleanup && npm run selenoid:stop && npm run selenoid:rm && npm run clean
scripts.preavaselenoid: npm run build && npm run selenoid:download && npm run selenoid:configure && npm run selenoid:start
scripts.avaselenoid: cross-env runningType=selenoid npm run ava && npm run aftertest || npm run aftertest
